translation.en: [Mousy] Hillston pitch is in 20 minutes. Both feet in today, okay, Miles?

translation.en: I don't have anything. Just... I need a little more time.

translation.en: I just need a couple of days.
You've been a pleasant surprise lately. You need more time, too?

translation.en: Thanks, Miles. Be a pal, pass these out.
Pal, take one, pass it down. There we go.

translation.en: I don't know, one day I just decided to start looking people in the eye and tell 'em,

- No. - Sono andato in un centro benessere.

translation.en: [exhales] It was like this cleanse... full mind, body, soul.

translation.en: You have to be recommended by a previous client,

translation.en: Mm. So, how'd you get in?
And it is coin, I'm not shitting you.
So why are you telling me?
-When one succeeds, we all succeed. -Oh, come-- Bullshit.

translation.en: Okay, look, I get a 10% referral fee. Plus...

translation.en: to be honest with you, I'm not exactly worried about the competition.

translation.en: I'll be up in a minute.

We're never gonna be able to make a baby if you won't keep your first appointment. It's like...

translation.en: I mean... And, you know, your work will pick up.
You know, a sperm analysis is nothing to be ashamed of.

translation.en: Let's just talk about it later, all right? I don't... Let's not ruin a nice morning.

Uh, I don't know. The laundry room maybe?

- Acqua al cetriolo? - Scusate, quello era Tom Brady? Ci dispiace, la riservatezza è la nostra massima priorità.

Ah, yes. Did he tell you about Top Happy, the process?

[Miles] What time do you have to be at work in the morning?

-What are you? -I don't want any trouble.
I don't know what's happening. I would just like you to leave my house, please.

is that I was upstairs with my wife.

- che ero di sopra con mia moglie. - Aspetta. - Tua moglie? - E ora un mio clone mi ha aggredito.

-Yeah. -You can borrow some of mine in the laundry room.

I'm drinking lemonade, waiting for my mom to pick me up. What happened?

If you're that desperate, I'll give you a tug job.

Clonazione? Ultrarapida, con trasferimento della memoria microsinaptica.
Ultrarapida, con trasferimento della memoria microsinaptica.

translation.en: There you go. You hit the nail right on the head.
Well, what were you planning on doing with the original me?

translation.en: Ideally we grind then dissolve in acid solution,
translation.it: Di norma tritureremmo il corpo e lo scioglieremmo nell'acido,

No. We'd harvest your organ first.

Vi porgiamo le nostre più sentite scuse.

translation.en: All right, little detail you might have noticed.
There's two of us, but there is one home, there's one car, one life.

translation.en: So, what do you suggest we do?
Okay, here's what we can do. Ten percent discount.
